title: Pharmacologic and Psychosocial Interventions for Reducing Irritability in Youth With ADHD
itunes:title: Pharmacologic and Psychosocial Interventions for Reducing Irritability in Youth With ADHD
description:
In this episode, we discuss the interventions found to be efficacious in youth with ADHD. Specifically, would treatment with stimulants be effective at reducing irritability in youth with ADHD? 

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D. 
Host: Richard Seeber, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 39
  • A Mini-Review of Pharmacologic and Psychosocial Interventions for Reducing Irritability Among Youth With ADHD
